name: zodiacore
description: Comprehensive astrology web application with microservices architecture

scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend" "npm run dev --prefix services/zc1-vedic" "npm run dev --prefix services/zc2-chinese" "npm run dev --prefix services/zc3-western" "npm run dev --prefix services/zc4-numerology"
scripts.build:prod: npm run build --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix backend
scripts.build:all: npm run build:prod && npm run build --prefix services/zc1-vedic && npm run build --prefix services/zc2-chinese && npm run build --prefix services/zc3-western && npm run build --prefix services/zc4-numerology
scripts.test:all: npm run test:run && npm run test:run --prefix backend && npm run test:run --prefix frontend && npm run test:run --prefix services/zc1-vedic && npm run test:run --prefix services/zc2-chinese && npm run test:run --prefix services/zc3-western && npm run test:run --prefix services/zc4-numerology
scripts.lint:all: npm run lint && npm run lint --prefix backend && npm run lint --prefix frontend && npm run lint --prefix services/zc1-vedic && npm run lint --prefix services/zc2-chinese && npm run lint --prefix services/zc3-western && npm run lint --prefix services/zc4-numerology
scripts.format:all: npm run format && npm run format --prefix backend && npm run format --prefix frontend && npm run format --prefix services/zc1-vedic && npm run format --prefix services/zc2-chinese && npm run format --prefix services/zc3-western && npm run format --prefix services/zc4-numerology
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend

author: ZodiaCore Team
